mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members ( email, password, nickname, phone_number, birthdate, gender, my_team_code, social_provider, social_uid, role, status ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{phoneNumber}, #{birthdate}, #{gender}, #{myTeamCode}, IFNULL(#{socialProvider}, 'NONE'), #{socialUid}, 'USER', 'ACTIVE' )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM members WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
